notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: W.H., K.W.S. and U.W. conceived the project idea and contributed substantially to the paper writing. B.M., P.M., W.H. conceived and designed the Transport Modelling Tool, R.R. the Dispersion Model. H.-P.H. reviewed and compiled the relative risks and J.D. and R.G. designed the Austrian Health Model. G.B. designed the CGE-model and contributed the macroeconomic results and wrote on the paper. B.W. conceived and designed the Economic Assessment Tool and the Transport Modelling Tool and contributed substantially to the paper~writing.
